class.name: VeloDecodeStatus
class.author: David Hutchcroft
class.desc: Record the status of the VELO Raw decoders for pattern recognition algs later
* * * Record the status of the VELO Raw decoders for pattern * recognition algs later * *

attribute.desc: Output status for sensors as a map by sensor number (no entry = unknown)
attribute.name: decoderStatus

method.desc: Set the status for a sensor
method.name: setDecoderState

method.desc: Get the status for a sensor
method.name: wasDecoded
method.code: if( 0 == m_decoderStatus.count(nSensor) ) return false; return m_decoderStatus.at(nSensor);
